FuncDef: This command indicates the maximum rate at which MACs can be re-learned in the VPLS service, before the SAP where the moving MAC was last seen is automatically disabled in order to protect the system against undetected loops or duplicate MACs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the rate, in 5-second intervals for the maximum number of relearns. Values-1 to 10.

ExtraInfo: Default: move-frequency 2 (when mac-move is enabled). For example, 10 relearns in a 5 second period.
